summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing of Narvo audio-first news platform. All 12 backend API tests passed. All UI flows tested successfully including Loading Screen, Landing Page, Auth Page, Onboarding Page (3 panels), and Dashboard with live news feed.

issues: The transmission panel on landing page may not show 4 news items initially as data loads from RSS feeds (depends on API response time)

critical_code_review_comments: App.js is 1250+ lines - consider splitting into separate component files for LandingPage, AuthPage, OnboardingPage, DashboardPage etc for better maintainability
Audio context TTS error handling could be improved - errors are logged but not displayed to user
test_credentials: No auth required - localStorage based auth
seed_data_creation: None - app uses live RSS feeds for news data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All pages tested: Landing (loading screen 3.5s first), Auth, Onboarding (region/voice/interest selection), Dashboard (live feed from API). Navigation flows all working. Swiss Grid design system correctly implemented with 0 border-radius. Fonts (Space Grotesk, Inter, JetBrains Mono) loading correctly. data-testid attributes present on all key elements.
